div.p: Estimated accuracies (and 95% confidence interval) for EBVs and GEBVs of egg‐laying date for four different estimation methods (ped: pedigree only, vR: vanRaden ( 2008), Y: Yang et al. ( 2010), vR‐ped: vanRaden ( 2008) including the pedigree in the estimation, Y‐ped: Yang et al. ( 2010) including the pedigree in the estimation). See Methods for details on estimation procedure.
